mapper.insert: INSERT INTO discussion (email, media_no, discussion_title, discussion_offer) VALUES (#{email}, #{mediaNo}, #{discussionTitle}, #{discussionOffer})
mapper.select: SELECT U.nickname AS nickname, D.discussion_title, D.discussion_offer, D.discussion_created_at, D.review_no, D.discussion_no, D.view_count, COUNT(R.discussion_reply_no) AS reply_count FROM discussion D INNER JOIN user U ON U.email = D.email LEFT JOIN discuss_reply R ON R.discussion_no = D.discussion_no GROUP BY U.nickname, D.discussion_title, D.discussion_offer, D.discussion_created_at, D.review_no, D.discussion_no, D.view_count ORDER BY D.discussion_no DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{amount}
